title: 'Very Poor Quality'
body: Very Poor Quality. I think they gave me very old pillows. When I opened it, they did not regained their shape. They are very thin. After using 2 weeks, I found that the fiber inside is also breaking. I ordered 4 pillows and I repent. My returning window is also closed. They are looking very poor and bad and I cannot use them now. Even they don't deserve this 1 star.

title: 'Just right for me...'
body: 'I keep trying pillows or different brands including Ikea as well Solimo I bought both regular and ultra soft it has turned out to be the finest that i have bought so far from a immidiate and short term usage review How does it hold it itself in the longer run is to be seen...'

title: 'Pathetic Quality'
body: 'Two of the pillows did not fluff up at all after opening and the other two that did fluff up had bunched up microfiber lumps all over which made them impossible to use. Unfortunately I had exceeded the return window by the time I opened the pillows (I had bought them for use in a village home) so I am stuck with them. But I would not recommend them to anybody. Extremely bad quality.'
